Product Description

All you have to do is roll the dice, calculate number combinations, then start flipping!

A traditional game of counting, addition, and probability, Shut-the-Box dates as far back as the 12th century when this game was enjoyed by Norman fishermen after a long day at sea. Shut The Box is an engaging wooden dice game that has good educational value., the game aims to get all the numbers down from 1-9 then you can ‘shut the box. The simple version is to roll both the dice and then flip down one or two numbers to match the total on two dice. Coogam shut the box games made of high-quality wood, solid wooden dice smoothly without sharp edges ensure safer for kids. The package also comes with a portable drawstring bag for storing dice.

Coogam shut the box game includes:

1 x Shut the box (11.8 x 11.8’’)1 x Drawstring bag (4.5 x 5.7”)1 x Instruction 10 x Dice

Popular Board Game

The tiles are easy to flip with double-sided numbers. Well-made numbered tiles are permanently in place and can’t get lost, a mess-free game even for kids. The classic game play can be much more enjoyable with 2, 3, and 4 people. Enjoy the fun game night with family in this interactive and relaxing board game.

Premium Quality Wood

There are four different colors (red, green, blue, yellow), and each player gets their dice. Two extra non-colored wooden dice spare in case of missing. With a portable drawstring bag, the game is easy to pack for picnics, party and traveling. Smart, educational high-quality board games match any occasion: Bar, home, classroom, camping, etc.

Perfect Family Game

Although daily routine might make you feel exhausted, we must spend quality time with children. Here comes the shut the box game at the very end of the day. The easy setup board game with simple rules(instructions attached) helps to soothe your tension and allows you to bond over with kids. Play shut the box game with friends or family can be a great way of socializing.

Package Belongings: Includes one solid pine wood shut the box game(11.8 x 11.8’’), ten wooden dice of five different colors, one instruction manual, and a nice portable drawstring bag.
High-Quality Material: Fine craftsmanship of shut the box made of premium New Zealand pine wood with clear numbers, solid material assure long-time durability. Bright colors are sharp and eye-popping, with large polyester green felt for the soft dice roll. Eight wooden colored dice following the four play sides, with two extra spare dice for multiple ways of play.
Arithmetic Practice: The Coogam shut the box game gives practice in math without kids realizing they are learning numbers and counting while playing the game! The quick addition game helps greatly with number recognition with enjoying flipping the numbers up and down. Train little one’s early mathematics concept like calculation with a bit of challenging yet a lot of fun play!
Portable Game: Designed in a perfect size, Coogam shut the box is a super fun little game to take along camping, traveling, picnic, and parties. The package comes with a portable drawstring bag for easy dice packing and storing. An ideal family game night choice for indoor/ outdoor entertainment.
Creative Gift: Shut the box is a popular board game for decades. The game offers hours of fun with simple rules has become a family’s all-time favored game. Perfect as one of the Christmas/ Thanksgiving/ Easter gifts for all boys and girls.

From the brand

TOOL DAILY

Tool Daily has accumulated abundant manufacturing experience in the past 20 years and possess our own factory.

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

Adjustable Snow Foam Lance with 1/4″ quick connection fitting. Container Capacity: 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon. Specification: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI.
EASY to install: fill some soap into the bottle with warm water to get thick foam; Then connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to Pressure Washer Gun or Wand. Finally, adjust the knob on the top to desired foam level and then foam sprayer will disperse thick foam. The knob adjusts the foam dispensing amount and the nozzle adjusts the sprinkle pattern.
Adjustable nozzle for accurate mixing and foam generation. Turn the top knob right (-) to get the thickest mixture, adjust the nozzle to get a proper sprinkle pattern, and let it loose.
5 Nozzle Tips have different angle (0, 15, 25, 40, 65 degree). Choose different nozzle according to the actual need. Such as watering flowers and plants, washing car. They also can be attached to a Quick-Connect Wand for swifter application and more.
Application: ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Tool Daily: The Great Brand for Pressure Washer Accessory

Tool Daily are committed to developing more efficient and safer pressure washer accessory, helping people reducing the tiredness of spraying and cleaning in the garden. We are known for amazing pressure washer accessory, such as nozzle, wand, gun, coupler, foam cannon.

Feature

  • Universal foam cannon with 1/4″ quick disconnection fits almost all pressure washer.
  • Adjustable foam cannon can mix cleaning fluid with water accurately and generate foam quickly.
  • The bottle can be filled in with 1 Liter cleaning fluid. Spray angle and suction amount of cleaning fluid can be adjusted according to needs.
  • It is used to wash motorcycle, car, roofs, driveways, siding, floors and windows.
  • Working Condition: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI
  • Max Temperature: 60℃ / 140℉.
  • Bottle Capacity: 1L.
  • PACKAGE INCLUDE
  • 1 X Foam cannon
  • 1 X Red Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (0 Degree)
  • 1 X Yellow Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (15 Degree)
  • 1 X Green Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (25 Degree)
  • 1 X White Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (40 Degree)
  • 1 X Brass soap nozzle tip (65 Degree)

Read more

How to Install Foam Cannon

Step 1. Fill some soap into the bottle with warm water. The foam cannon’s bottle is graduated and can hold 1000 ml.

Step 2. Connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to pressure washer gun or wand.

Step 3. Adjust the knob to desired foam level and then it disperses thick foam.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:09 UTC – Details)


3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a high performance automotive tape ideal for attaching exterior automotive body side moldings, wheel lip molding, door edge molding, badges, nameplates, emblems, LED Lights and trim.
Ideal for attaching moldings, emblems and trim to exterior painted automotive surfaces
For industrial/occupational use only. Not for consumer sale or use.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape

Details

  • Permanently attaches side moldings, trim and emblems to vehicle exteriors and interiors
  • Excellent for narrow width applications
  • High strength double-sided adhesive withstands weather and impact
  • Easy-to-use press-on tape eliminates tools and mess
  • An excellent alternative to rivets
  • Add long term value to your vehicles, quickly and easily

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is ideal for permanently attaching side moldings and trim to your vehicles, adding long-term protection and value. Use the same elastic bonding technology employed for airplanes and skyscrapers to attach narrow body moldings, trim and emblems to your vehicle. This tape features an extremely strong adhesive, and it’s also easy to use – just pull of the liner and apply.

A High-Performance Tape Specifically for Auto Exteriors

Designed specifically for auto care and maintenance, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape permanently attaches plastic, metal, carbon fiber and composite parts to your vehicle’s painted or unpainted surfaces. With this narrow-width tape, you can install side body moldings, drip rail moldings or fender and wheel trim to add instant protection against door dings and other hazards. Use this high-strength double-sided tape to add value to your vehicle by quickly installing or restoring decorative interior and exterior trim or factory emblems. The tape adhesive bonds instantly and holds up to impact, moisture and solvents used in routine maintenance.

Read more

Why Use Attachment Tape?

Unlike mechanical fasteners such as screws, rivets or clips, attachment tape does not require drilling or piercing holes in sheet metal which can lead to rust and corrosion. It goes on without the mess of other adhesives that can run, drip or smear, which means less cleanup during the installation and after it’s complete. The final installation is clean, low profile and very secure – just like in a professional shop.

3M Exterior Attachment Tape is exceptionally easy to use. You don’t need any special tools – just cut the tape with a scissors to the desired length. Then simply apply tape to the trim, light, emblem, body side, wheel lip or door edge molding, position, remove the peel-off liner and press the item in place on the vehicle exterior.

Reduced Vibration for a Smoother, Quieter Ride

By securely fastening trim, emblems, lights and other exterior items, 3M Exterior Attachment Tape can also help reduce unwanted noise and vibrations as you operate your vehicle. It can serve as a sound-deadener, reducing the vibration of loose parts and the resulting noise through your vehicle’s metal and aluminum components. This make rides quieter and smoother, and improves overall satisfaction with your vehicle even when you’re not driving it.

The Science of Better Auto Care from 3M

Since a 3M lab assistant invented masking tape in the 1930s, 3M has been developing products to help you get the most enjoyment and value from your vehicles. 3M Exterior Attachment Tape is a great example: instantly add value and longevity to your vehicle with moldings, emblems and other components, without tools or mess. This attachment tape is also an excellent example of what 3M does best – Science. Applied to Life.

Read more

4.5
Price: $9.54
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:09 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Easy to install. Scan, Plug and Play. Full installation and setup in less than 10 minutes
Protected and informed, with Realtime phone app notifications, emails, SMS messages and automations (turn on optional sirens, smart plugs..)
FAIL/SAFE: Patented technology! Pair your leak sensors to battery powered valve controllers and/or sirens. No internet, no WiFi, power outage no worries!
Latest Wireless Technology LoRa: low-power consumption (5+ year battery life) and “Longest Range, by Far!” (1/4 mile, open air)
Whole house smart home solution: Your YoLink leak detection system is part of a complete product line, including smart wireless automatic water shut-off and a full smart home solution, including security, locks, plugs & switches, temperature, humidity, and smoke/CO sensors, and more
Requirements – Android or iOS smartphone, wired ethernet port or WiFi connection. App is always free, with 5 free texts per device, plus 5, per month.

INTRODUCTION:

  • YoLink Hub & Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)
  • The Hub connects your YoLink devices to the Internet and to the user-friendly YoLink app, and is the central controller for your YoLink wireless home automation system

FEATURES:

  • Wi-Fi (2.4 GHz only) or wired network connection options YoLink’s industry-leading long range communication (up to ¼ mile open air) based on LoRa long range technology

BENEFITS:

  • Very easy plug & play initial set-up – no special network or computer knowledge required. Simply plug the included Ethernet patch cord into an available working network port on your router (suggested) or use a 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi connection and be up and running in moments
  • While many smart home devices rely on the home Wi-Fi system and may crowd your network or harm your Wi-Fi performance, the YoLink devices communicate with the Hub via the proprietary YoLink Protocol at the 923.3 MHz frequency (only your Hub connects to the Wi-Fi/network and Internet)
  • Homes with devices on Wi-Fi, or other protocols, with access to the Internet, are each, individual, potential safety, privacy, and security risks. Acting as the internet gateway the YoLink Hub connects your YoLink devices to the internet via one encrypted connection, providing safety and security for your network and home

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Router with 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Or router with an available Ethernet port (patch cord is included) Smartphone or tablet running iOS 9 or higher, Android 4.4 or higher Tools Required: None (Hub may optionally be wall-mounted. Refer to the Installation & User Guide for more information) Installation Difficulty Level: Moderately Easy

TECHNICAL SPECS:

  • Semtech LoRa RF Module YL09 microcontroller with 32-Bit RISC processor Frequency, LoRa: 923.3 MHz Frequency, Wi-Fi: 2412 – 2462 MHz Color: White Dimensions [L x W x D]: 4.33 x 4.33 x 1.06 inches (110 x 110 x 27 mm) Status LEDs (Top):
  • Green power indicator Red feature indicator Blue Internet indicator
  • Ethernet Status Indicators (Rear)
  • Green network speed indicator Yellow network speed indicator
  • Set button (Rear) Network connector: RJ45 Power connector: Micro-USB B Power: 5 Volts DC
  • Environmental: Operating Temperature Range: -4°F – 104°F (-20°C – 50°C) Operating Humidity Range: ≤ 90% non-condensing Intended for indoor use only

PACKAGE CONTENTS:

  • (1) YoLink Hub (1) USB cable (1) Ethernet patch cable (1) AC/DC plug-in power supply (1) Quick start guide
  • YoLink Water Leak Sensors (see listing details for quantity)

QUALITY BELLS&DURABILITY-Large,thick-walled jingle bells are made from durable metals.Tasteful design of silver coating of bells keep them shiny.And jingle sounds are easy on your ears from the playful dogs.Belt is custom made from heavy duty nylon material and tested thoroughly for its ruggedness.Our Bells are the loudest metal dog doorbells available on the market today and ring loud and clear every time!And lasts longer than other cheaply made alternatives.
FREE Gift-To appreciate your purchase, we are offering a dog whistle FREE along with this product. Hope you like it. But please remember, your fullest satisfaction is our top priority. If you are not happy with the purchase for any reason, do let us know. We refund or offer an exchange to ensure you become part of Papikin family.

This BLUETREE dog doorbell is the best Communication tool between you and your furry friend.House training, potty training for your doggy.With adjustable door bell length, small dogs, medium dogs, big dogs and large dogs all love with our dog bells.The tasteful design of silver coating of bells keep them shiny and jingle sounds are easy on your ears from the playful dogs.

Dog scratching doors! Help! Hate Barking, scratching broken the door? We offering an efficient way for your pet to let you know they need to go out.

-QUALITY Tired of cheap imitation bells?

-Tired of poor quality?

-Can not withst and the urge ang pull of your dog?

-As a doting pet owner,

-If you want to avoid carpet stains!

-This shoumelodious chime likes a signal from your puppyld be your last stop.

-“let me outside and I might go potty”

-It is a brilliantly simple solution to potty training.

DOG BELLS ARE THE PEFECT SOLUTION TO TOILET TRAIN YOUR LOVELY PET. HERE ARE 4 SIMPLE STMPLE AND EFFECTIVE STEPS TO TRAIN YOUR DOG TO USE DOORBELL.

STEPS 1. Introduce the bell to the dog. Let them feel it by sniffing it. let them hear the sound of the bell. Encourage its interest by giving her treats and show your appreciation that it knows you use only when she does good job (like good girl, my man.. good job etc.)

STEPS 2. Second stage is to get your dog to ring the bell. For this you can take the bell outside and show your how to ring the bell. You can use family environment she is comfortable with. Every time it rings the bell give her treat. Few dogs do better with lot of attention they get some get distracted. So please chose the set up based on your dog’s nature.

STEPS 3. Now place the bell where you intend to place it. Like hanging it to your backside door where you normally let the dog out. Ensure bell is firmly attached so that it doesn’t fall out by a simple tug/pull which might scare them. Again positively reinforce your appreciation with treat and words when they ring, do open the door and give her a treat when it goes out the door.

STEPS 4. It it is time make it a habit. If you used to let your dog go outside once you are up to let it potty/pee, use the same setup but this time make your dog ring the bell. Reward once it rings the bell and steps outside. Keep repeating this process until it becomes natural for the dog to ringing the bell is the natural way to ask to be let out.

Other tips：

Do this before your dog has breakfast so he is more food motivated.We strongly recommend patience and continuous positive reinforcement throughout. Dogs that love outdoors may take to the training faster. Consistency also plays a key role during initial days like, not letting your dog follow you outside without ringing the bell or giving treats when it doesn’t complete its part of the bargain.

(as of Nov 29,2022 03:29:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

1 Heart Rate Monitor 2 BP & SpO2 Monitor 3 Sleep Tracking

1 Long Battery Life 2 How to Charge 3 IP67 Water Resistance

How to monitor your blood pressure and blood oxygen?

1. Set personal information in the App.

2. Wear the watch 1.5-2.5cm below the wrist bone.

3. Enter the monitoring mode and keep your arm stable.

4. Wait 10 ~15 seconds to show the data.

Note: the data cannot be used as a medical-grade test.

How to reconnect the smart watch with smartphones?

For iPhone: Remove Device ‘P22’ in the HeroBandIII App→Open ‘Settings’→Click ‘8luetooth’→Select ‘P22’→Click ‘（i）’ →Click ‘Forget This Device’→Reconnect the smart watch in App

For Android: Remove ‘P22’ in the App→Reconnect the smart watch in App

How to get message notifications on the watch if you do not allow the App to receive notifications when installing App?

1. For iOS: ‘Phone Settings’→Click ‘8luetooth’→’P22’→Turn on ‘Share System Notification’

For Android: Open App→’Notifications’→’Notification access’→Turn on ‘HeroBandIII’

2.Open ‘Phone Settings’→’Notification’→’HeroBandⅢ’→Turn on ‘Allow Notification’

How to reset time on the watch?

The watch time is synced with the connected smartphone.

If the watch time is wrong, please unbind with phone first.

Then follow the steps above to reconnect with smartphone to get the correct time.

How to track your steps correctly?

1. Set personal information correctly in the APP.

2. Wear the watch 1.5-2.5 cm below the wrist bone, and adjust the strap not too tightly or too loosely.

3. Let your arms swing naturally while walking.

Sleep and Blood Oxygen Saturation: The Tracker can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Pressure, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your deep, light sleep state which can help you better understand your health. (NOTE: the data cannot be used as a medical-grade test)
Notifications and More Practical Features: All messages and notifications will show on your wrist and remind you through vibration. It cannot answer call or text on watch. There are also many convenient functions like Timer, Wake-up Gesture, Find Phone, Sedentary Reminder, Music Control and Weather Display.
1.4 Inch Full-touch Screen & Custom Watch Face: The watch with 1.4 inch LCD screen can provide you with high-quality touch and visual experience. Five levels of brightness options allow you to easily read information in the sun or dark. Also you can choose a picture you like to customize the watch face on HeroBand III. (Wristband Size: 5.85 – 8.78 inch)
Great Battery Life and Wide Compatibility: Our smart watch is compatible with iOS 9.0/Android OS 4.4 or above smartphones. It can be used for up to 7 days and standby for 30+ days after fully charged.

Previous page

  2. KALINCO was established in 2018. It’s a young and creative smart watch brand. We focus on creating fashion, lightweight and multi-functional smart watches to satisfy the needs of different groups for fitness and intelligent monitoring.

    We adhere to the concept of people-oriented, integrity and customer first, create a story of KALINCO with each customer.

▲Package Included:
1 x (1/4 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 6.35mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (3/8 * 1/4 * 65mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 9mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x (1/2 * 1/4 * 72mm length — 1/4 ” shank can be converted to 13mm square head)Socket Adapter
1 x 105 Degree Right Angle Drill
▲Key Features: 
1. Adapts sockets to power drills and drivers
2. Detent ball for secure socket retention so sockets snap on tightly and won’t slip off
3. 1/4-inch hex shank prevents stripping during high speed drill operation
4. Super strong heat-treated chrome vanadium steel for normal and impact use
5. Sandblasted finish
6. Converts all power drills into speedy socket drivers
7. Use with a hand screwdriver handle or battery/power tool
8. Color coded for easy recognition 
▲Specification:
● Material: stainless steel
● Color: silver(as pictures shown)
● Size: approx. 5.9 x 3cm
● Model: 1/4″ (6.35mm)
● Fits: 1/4″ 6.35mm hex drill bit screwdriver
Features:
● 105°designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver, max torque: 10n/m.
● 1/4 inch hex drive shaft is quick change compatible and fits most power drill and driver chucks.
● 105 Degree Right Angle Driver Drilling and Driving Power Screwdriver Drill Attachment with 1/4-inch Hex Quick Change Drive and Magnetic Bit Socket
● Easy & fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● Can be connected to drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench.
● Easy, Lightweight, fast, connect to the standard hex screwdrier.
● The gears are mounted in a die cast with 3 durable ball bearings.
● Magnetic 1/4 inch hex socket accepts and holds standard drill and driver bits.
● Perfect handy tool for hard-to-reach areas.Connect hand drill and manual wrench.
【Colorful】：Easy to Choose: Different colour coded rings, clear help quickly pick the right one. Our products belong to the latest upgrades, quality is super good.Christmas Gift for Dad/Father,Husband, Boyfriend, Men,DIY.
CR-V and black phosphate finish. Forged with heat treated chrome vanadium steel for superior strength, each adapter with corrosion-resistant black phosphate finish for against rust and corrosion. Detent ball on adapters provides a secure fit into the socket,reduces wear and prevents rounding off at corners,ensuring does not wobble while working.
【Multifunction-3Pcs】Used in the installation of pneumatic screwdriver, electric screwdriver, pneumatic drill, manual screwdriver and other installation for the hexagonal tool .It is a good accessory for conversion. for Universal Socket,Impact Adapter and Reducer Set,Universal Joint Set,Socket Adapter and Drive Reducer Set,Drive Impact Socket Extension Bar Set,Drive Impact Socket Set.
【Purpose-3Pcs】: This adapter set is designed to provide a securely locked in extension to your existing tool. Provides additional length to reach into a multitude of hard to reach spaces. The spring ball lock ensures a tight fit into the driver head to prevent slipping during use. Specifically machined to fit securely into a hand held driver, drill driver or impact wrench.
【Wide application-105°Right Angle Drill Driver】Can be connected to the drill, rechargeable drill or manual wrench, extending their reach to inaccessible stenosis , twisting screws, nut and more【Features】105° designs for tight spaces, extends the power of a cordless screwdriver – 100 in/lbs. torque, 400 RPM.These Tools are Work Great for Light Drilling,Slow Speed/Screw Driving,Like Cordless Drill,Ratchet Hand Screwdriver,etc.
